name: project-management-monorepo
description: Full-Stack Project Management System - Next.js Frontend + .NET Backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd apps/backend && dotnet publish ProjectManagement -c Release -o ./publish
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd apps/backend && rm -rf ProjectManagement/bin ProjectManagement/obj ProjectManagement.Tests/bin ProjectManagement.Tests/obj
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/frontend && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/backend && dotnet ef database update
scripts.db:migrate:add: cd apps/backend && dotnet ef migrations add
